name: Nichola's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Truffles
author: Nichola
summary: These truffles are made with edible cookie dough, so they don't contain eggs and are safe to eat! They are delicious and fairly easy to make! Keep them in the fridge to prevent the chocolate from melting.
directions: Place brown sugar and butter in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy, 4 to 5 minutes
Mix in milk, vanilla, and salt
Add flour; mix thoroughly by hand
Fold 1 cup chocolate chips into the dough
Cover and refrigerate for about 1 hour
Scoop out tablespoonfuls of cookie dough and roll into round balls
Arrange them on a plate or baking sheet that will fit in the freezer
Place 1 1/2 cup chocolate chips and white chocolate chips in separate microwave-safe bowls
Continue to microwave in 10-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until completely melted, 30 seconds to 1 minute
Dip cookie dough balls in melted chocolate
